Text: I find it funny that these guys have worked their ass off for 30+ years to get paid and people like us really screw them. Oh well, I guess Hell is crowded nowadays..

I am sorry, maybe you are hurting them but not all of us do.

I download to listen to the music and buy what I like, I think it's fair. I have seen them on TV and thought their music was nice. I am going to try it first.

Yepp! That's how I do it too. I've paid a ticket to see them before, and now I'm gonna check out their music further and eventually try to go to more anvil concerts in the future and buy their merch and albums later if they appears to be good which I thougth they were on the concert! :D
I never have enough money to buy CDs or MP3s, so no one is losing shit from my downloads.
